properties.displayName: Deploy Azure Monitor Baseline Alerts for Identity
properties.description: Initiative to deploy AMBA alerts relevant to the ALZ Identity management group

metadata.displayName: ALZ Monitor Resource Group Name
metadata.description: Name of the resource group where the alerting resources will be deployed

metadata.displayName: ALZ Monitor Resource Group Tags
metadata.description: Tags for the resource group where the alerting resources will be deployed

metadata.displayName: ALZ Monitor Resource Group Location
metadata.description: Location of the resource group where the alerting resources will be deployed

metadata.displayName: KeyVault Request Alert Severity
KeyVault Request Alert Window Size
KeyVault Request Alert Evaluation Frequency
KeyVault Request Alert Policy Effect
metadata.description: Policy effect for the alert, deployIfNotExists will deploy the alert if it does not exist, disabled will not deploy the alert

metadata.displayName: KeyVault Request Alert State
metadata.description: State of the alert, true will enable the alert, false will disable the alert
